tool_description: This API allows easy creation of website screenshots
name: Easy Website Screenshots
title: Easy Website Screenshots

api_list.name: Get
api_list.description: This endpoint creates a screenshot of a website and returns the image as Base64 or PNG.

optional_parameters.name: width
optional_parameters.description: Maximum width is 2048. If omitted, default width of 1280 will be used.

optional_parameters.name: height
optional_parameters.description: If you specify -1, full page will be captured

optional_parameters.name: returnType
optional_parameters.description: Return type can be either **base64** or **png**. If omitted, **base64** is default.
